IRCC.subject: HRX.IRCC
IRCC.description: Internationally Recognized Certificate of Compliance. Kotka checks from the ABS Clearing House that the entered IRCC number exists and is valid.
IRCC.title: IRCC number

availableForGeneticResearch.subject: HRX.availableForGeneticResearch
availableForGeneticResearch.description: If you choose "Yes, with restrictions", explain the restrictions in the following field "Rights and obligations".
availableForGeneticResearch.title: Is genetic research allowed on the genetic resource(s)?

collectionID.subject: HRX.collectionID
collectionID.description: For statiscal purposes. The collection where the transaction is directed to. Record transactions directed to different collections as separate transactions if you use this field.
collectionID.title: Collection

correspondentOrganization.subject: HRX.correspondentOrganization
correspondentOrganization.description: Select the correspondent organization from a list. If not found on the list, you need to add the new organization first.
correspondentOrganization.title: Correspondent organization

correspondentPerson.subject: HRX.correspondentPerson
correspondentPerson.description: Name of the corresponding person. If the transaction goes to a private person, write his/her postal address here.
correspondentPerson.title: Corresponding person/contact info

dueDate.subject: HRX.dueDate
dueDate.description: Date when the loan needs to be returned.
dueDate.title: Due date

geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry.subject: HRX.geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry
geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry.description: Country where the genetic resource or traditional knowledge was acquired from, provider country, country of origin. List of countries in Kotka is based on ISO 3166 Country Codes -standard and may differ from the country list in ABSCH.
geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry.title: Acquisition country

geneticResourceAcquisitionDate.subject: HRX.geneticResourceAcquisitionDate
geneticResourceAcquisitionDate.description: Date when the genetic resource or traditional knowledge was aqcuired.
geneticResourceAcquisitionDate.title: Acquisition date

geneticResourceDescription.subject: HRX.geneticResourceDescription
geneticResourceDescription.description: Description of the genetic resource or traditional knowledge (possible identifiers, taxa, number of specimens, region etc.). Instruction source EU DECLARE User manual and QA.
geneticResourceDescription.title: Description

geneticResourceRightsAndObligations.subject: HRX.geneticResourceRightsAndObligations
geneticResourceRightsAndObligations.description: Presence or absence of rights and obligations relating to access and benefit sharing, including rights and obligations regarding subsequent applications and commercialization. Instruction source EU DECLARE user manual and QA.
geneticResourceRightsAndObligations.title: Rights and obligations

geneticResourceSource.subject: HRX.geneticResourceSource
geneticResourceSource.description: Person or legal entity from whom the user obtained the genetic resources directly, i.e. the previous actor in the value chain. Often a museum or other organization. If a genetic resource is obtained directly from the provider country, the name of the country should be provided. Instruction source EU DECLARE User manual and QA.
geneticResourceSource.title: Source

geneticResourceType.subject: HRX.geneticResourceType
geneticResourceType.description: Choose the type of the genetic resource for statistical and reporting purposes.
geneticResourceType.title: Type of resource

hasIRCC.subject: HRX.hasIRCC
hasIRCC.description: Whether the resource has an IRCC number or not. If not, more information needs to be filled in.
hasIRCC.title: Do you have IRCC number?

internalRemarks.subject: HRX.internalRemarks
internalRemarks.description: Private remarks that are shown only in Kotka and not to the corresponding organisation.
internalRemarks.title: Internal remarks

localPersonEmail.subject: HRX.localPersonEmail
localPersonEmail.description: Responsible person's email in our museum.
localPersonEmail.title: Email

localResearcher.subject: HRX.localResearcher
localResearcher.description: For incoming loans, name of the researcher receiving the loan.
localResearcher.title: Receiving researcher

material.subject: HRX.material
material.description: Description of the material included in this transaction.
material.title: Material

numberOfParcels.subject: HRX.numberOfParcels
numberOfParcels.description: In how many parcels was the transaction sent
numberOfParcels.title: Number of parcels

isPartOf.subject: MY.isPartOf
isPartOf.description: Which parent or larger collection this is part of.
isPartOf.title: Is part of

publicRemarks.subject: HRX.publicRemarks
publicRemarks.description: Remarks that are shown to both parties of the transaction.
publicRemarks.title: Public remarks

receiptReturned.subject: HRX.receiptReturned
receiptReturned.description: When signed loan receipt was received from the loanee
receiptReturned.title: Receipt returned

requestReceived.subject: HRX.requestReceived
requestReceived.description: When loan request, loan, gift or exchange was received here.
requestReceived.title: Date requested

resourceImported.subject: HRX.resourceImported
resourceImported.description: Are you importing genetic resources, traditional knowledge associated to genetic resources or both?
resourceImported.title: What are you importing?

status.subject: HRX.status
status.description: Whether the transaction is closed, outstanding or in process.
status.title: Transaction status

type.subject: HRX.type
type.description: What kind of transaction this is.
type.title: Transaction type

underNagoya.subject: HRX.underNagoya
underNagoya.description: Is it e.g. non-human genetic material that is going to be used for genetic research as is defined by the protocol?
underNagoya.title: Does Nagoya protocol apply?

owner.subject: MZ.owner
owner.description: Team or organisation that owns the record and can edit it.
owner.title: Owner of record
